name: addTrackingRect(_:owner:userData:assumeInside:)
desc: Establishes  an area for tracking mouse-entered and mouse-exited events within the view and returns a tag that identifies the tracking rectangle.
declaration:
func addTrackingRect(_ rect: NSRect, 
               owner: Any, 
            userData data: UnsafeMutableRawPointer?, 
        assumeInside flag: Bool) -> NSView.TrackingRectTag
